title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-9.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 219-9.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The Federal requirements of 40 CFR part
60, subpart MMMM, incorporated by reference in Part 200 of this Title (see Table 2, section
200.10
of this Title), apply to
sewage sludge incineration (SSI) units, located at wastewater treatment
facilities, designed to treat domestic sewage sludge, the construction of which
commenced on or before October 14, 2010. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
219-9.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
